title: German minister says Europe-US ties stronger than China's as Western leaders step up Beijing visits
desc: At the 2026 Munich Security Conference, Germany's Foreign Minister Johann Wadephul reaffirmed strong US-Europe ties despite rising German investment in China. Tariffs and policy rifts under Donald Trump have fueled debate over Europe's strategic shift

title: Brian and Arthur: 'We might bicker but we're a good team'
desc: "I think the hardest time for us – and it's probably the case in a lot of relationships – was when we were trying to have a family", Brian tells Janice Butler.

title: NSW Police chases under scrutiny after two women die in crash as data shows rise in practice
desc: Lee Casuscelli and Maureen Crosland died when their car was hit in Camden by an allegedly stolen car that police had been pursuing.

title: Cost, consumer preference put rice imports high
desc: The United States Department of Agriculture’s (USDA) Grain and Feed 2025 Report reveals that local consumer preference is contributing largely to the country’s sustained interest in foreign rice consumption.

title: Avalanche crashes into train in the Swiss Alps causing ‘several casualties’
desc: Police launched a rescue operation after the train derailed near Goppenstein while carrying around 80 passengers.

title: Ski jumper banned from Winter Olympics because his shoes were too big
desc: Austrian ski jumper Daniel Tschofenig's Winter Olympic dreams were dashed after he was found to be wearing oversized shoes.

title: 'Love Go Go Go!' Opens at No. 1
desc: Romantic comedy 'Love Go Go Go!' debuted atop the China box office for the Feb. 13–15 weekend, taking $5.2 million.

title: How much is Heidi Klum's net worth after Project Runway, AGT and fashion empire success
desc: Heidi Klum's net worth has drawn curiosity after years on Project Runway, AGT, and her fashion empire. Explore how her fortune grew and her income streams.

title: PM pledges full implementation of people
